nodes.description: 伦敦两辆装满汽油和气瓶的奔驰车在市中心被发现未爆炸
nodes.support_text: Two Mercedes containing petrol, gas cylinders and nails were found outside the Tiger Tiger club in London's Haymarket and a nearby street on Friday.

nodes.description: 吉普车撞入格拉斯哥机场正门并引发火灾
nodes.support_text: A Jeep containing gas cylinders was driven into Glasgow Airport a day after two car bombs were found in London.

nodes.description: 格拉斯哥机场袭击者中一人在皇家亚历山大医院重伤
nodes.support_text: One of the two suspects held at Glasgow Airport on Saturday suffered severe burns and remains in a critical condition.

nodes.description: 两名嫌疑人于周六夜间在切斯特郡M6高速公路被捕
nodes.support_text: Two of those held by police are a 26-year-old man and 27-year-old woman who were arrested on the M6 near Sandbach, Cheshire, on Saturday night.

nodes.description: 第三名嫌疑人于周日早晨在利物浦被捕
nodes.support_text: Another 26-year-old man arrested in Liverpool on Sunday remains in custody at a Merseyside police station.

nodes.description: 格拉斯哥机场袭击车辆登记号L808 RDT被公布
nodes.support_text: Strathclyde Police issued the registration number of the Jeep used in the attempted attack on Glasgow Airport - L808 RDT.

nodes.description: 皇家亚历山大医院车辆实施可控爆炸
nodes.support_text: A controlled explosion was carried out on a car at the hospital where a suspect is being treated.

nodes.description: 英国提升至最高反恐警戒级别
nodes.support_text: The UK moved to its highest level of terror alert after the Jeep Cherokee crashed into the main doors of Glasgow Airport's main terminal.

nodes.description: Merseyside警方在利物浦搜查两处地址
nodes.support_text: Merseyside Police have been searching two addresses in the Liverpool area.

nodes.description: Staffordshire警方在纽卡斯尔-Unter-Lyme搜查一处地址
nodes.support_text: Staffordshire Police said its officers had been searching an address in Newcastle-under-Lyme with the West Midlands Counter Terrorism Unit and Met personnel.

nodes.description: 格拉斯哥机场完全恢复开放
nodes.support_text: Glasgow Airport was fully opened on Sunday afternoon, almost 24 hours after the incident.

nodes.description: 英国多个机场加强安保措施
nodes.support_text: A number of airports have taken extra measures, including Heathrow, Edinburgh, Newcastle, Birmingham, Manchester and Blackpool.

nodes.description: 温布顿网球锦标赛实施道路封锁
nodes.support_text: Road blocks have been set up in front of the gates to the All England Club.

nodes.description: 英国交通警察加强全国通勤安保
nodes.support_text: British Transport Police would 'do everything we possibly can to make people safe in their journeys to work tomorrow across the country'.

nodes.description: 布朗首相确认与基地组织关联
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Gordon Brown told Andrew Marr on BBC One's Sunday AM it was 'clear that we are dealing, in general terms, with people who are associated with al-Qaeda'.

nodes.description: 设立反恐热线和公众信息反馈渠道
nodes.support_text: Police have urged anyone with information to phone the confidential Anti-Terrorism hotline number on 0800789321.

nodes.description: 副警监Peter Clarke表示绝对有信心揭露攻击者的方法和网络细节
nodes.support_text: Deputy Assistant Commissioner Peter Clarke said he was 'absolutely confident' of uncovering details of the attackers' methods and network

nodes.description: BBC确认被捕男子身份为Dr Mohammed Asha
nodes.support_text: BBC确认被捕男子身份为Dr Mohammed Asha

edges.support_text: A Jeep containing gas cylinders was driven into Glasgow Airport a day after two car bombs were found in London.
One of the two suspects held at Glasgow Airport on Saturday suffered severe burns and remains in a critical condition.
Two of those held by police are a 26-year-old man and 27-year-old woman who were arrested on the M6 near Sandbach, Cheshire, on Saturday night.
Another 26-year-old man arrested in Liverpool on Sunday remains in custody at a Merseyside police station.
Strathclyde Police issued the registration number of the Jeep used in the attempted attack on Glasgow Airport - L808 RDT.
A controlled explosion was carried out on a car at the hospital where a suspect is being treated.
The UK moved to its highest level of terror alert after the Jeep Cherokee crashed into the main doors of Glasgow Airport's main terminal.
Glasgow Airport was fully opened on Sunday afternoon, almost 24 hours after the incident.
新信息每小时都在逐步公开与袭击事件存在时间关联
BBC确认被捕男子身份发生在袭击事件后
格拉斯哥机场袭击事件后警方发起呼吁
爆炸事件后警方完成关联推断
爆炸事件后确认关联性
机场袭击后展开跨区域搜查
警方在袭击事件后加强公众联系
被捕者被带到警局接受问询的后续动作
逮捕事件后警长发表声明
Merseyside Police have been searching two addresses in the Liverpool area.
Staffordshire Police said its officers had been searching an address in Newcastle-under-Lyme with the West Midlands Counter Terrorism Unit and Met personnel.
A number of airports have taken extra measures, including Heathrow, Edinburgh, Newcastle, Birmingham, Manchester and Blackpool.
Road blocks have been set up in front of the gates to the All England Club.
British Transport Police would 'do everything we possibly can to make people safe in their journeys to work tomorrow across the country'.
Prime Minister Gordon Brown told Andrew Marr on BBC One's Sunday AM it was 'clear that we are dealing, in general terms, with people who are associated with al-Qaeda'.
Police have urged anyone with information to phone the confidential Anti-Terrorism hotline number on 0800789321.
英国提升至最高反恐警戒级别后副警监 Andy Trotter 发表声明
英国提升至最高反恐警戒级别后内政大臣 Jacqui Smith 发表声明
